content.raw:
It looks like `Log` might become the interface to logging. If this is the case, I don't see the advantage of creating a new namespace. The new sub-directory also doesn't add much value.

We can always make this more complicated (namespaces, sub-directories) if the code requires it. I prefer to start simple, and then make things more complex when there is a clear need. 

There might be clear need right now...
